data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description: CNCPTS | 3,579 followers on LinkedIn. BOS  NYC  MIA  DBX | CNCPTS (pronounced “kän-septs") is a heritage retail brand that celebrates the confluence of ideas and creativity. Founded in 1996 by Tarek Hassan in Cambridge MA, CNCPTS has brick-and-mortar locations from NYC to Dubai, with its flagship located in Boston, MA. They are renowned for pioneering iconic collaborations with purveyors across global fashion houses, designing their in-house private label line, and sourcing the utmost of quality and forward thinking products in the world of footwear, apparel, and accessories.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
